title: How come Sylas isn't out yet?
body: The video that was released an hour ago says he hit live servers but he has yet so be in the client.

replies.body:
He's in our Collections, but isn't in the store. What the friggity frack riot?

I wouldn't mind being told what the hell is going on, I was under the assumption we would be able to buy him today, but if you go to your collection, there is an Unlock button, but when you click it you're told [This content is no longer available for purchase.](https://imgur.com/5snhaEr)
